Title: Creates a procedure for serving process and a notice of ex parte attachment following issuance of a pre-summons ex parte order of attachment when the defendant must be served in a foreign country
Summary: Creates a procedure for serving process and a notice of ex parte attachment following issuance of a pre-summons ex parte order of attachment when the defendant must be served in a foreign country; creates a standardized form for the notice of ex parte attachment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to creating a procedure for serving process and a notice of ex parte attachment following issuance of a pre-summons ex parte order of attachment when the defendant must be served in a foreign country
